TopicTitle: We could use an F18 RPM/ASET IVA for the MK1 inline.

Articles.Content: I cant tell you how cool that would be. The MK22 by BahamutoD is nice, but we really could use an F18 stockalike cockpit or IVA.
I have no idea how to use ASET to make IVAs, but I could try modeling a cockpit part and if someone wants to make an IVA for it, that would be great.
